verbs.description: Donald and Melania Trump [V: were] pictured together on Monday giving uncharacteristic displays of affection , including touching each other ’s back and walking close together , while en route from Washington to Ohio .

[ARG1: Donald and Melania Trump] were [V: pictured] [ARG2: together] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-ADV: giving uncharacteristic displays of affection , including touching each other ’s back and walking close together , while en route from Washington to Ohio] .

[ARG0: Donald and Melania Trump] were pictured together on Monday [V: giving] [ARG1: uncharacteristic displays of affection] , including touching each other ’s back and walking close together , while en route from Washington to Ohio .

Donald and Melania Trump were pictured together on Monday giving [ARG2: uncharacteristic displays of affection] , [V: including] [ARG1: touching each other ’s back and walking close together , while en route from Washington to Ohio] .
